summary: Lets any mod know when the player has entered a new cell by tracking a PapyrusUtils variable. PapyrusUtils SKSE plugin required.
descriptionHtml:
This utility mod takes the technique for checking when the player enters a new cell from the Creation Kit Wiki and puts the result in a handy variable that any script can access via [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58705/?]exiledviper's PapyrusUtilÂ  SKSE plugin[/url]. The variable is a StorageUtil Int and acts as a counter that increments when a new cell is entered.

This is intended to help modders. If you use it in your mod make sure your users have it and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58705/?]PapyrusUtil[/url] installed too.


Note: I uploaded a bum version the first time. New upload version 1.1 should be right. Sorry about that!
author: Unknown author from creationkitDOTcom and Pananacakes

files.name: Cell Tracker Utility.zip
files.changelogHtml: Removed unecessary distance-from-player condition that was breaking the mod in version 1.0
